title: FS: T206 Cobb Green Portrait  SOLD
author: Sterling Sports Auctions

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Green Portrait  SOLD
posts.post_content:
For Sale a T206 Ty Cobb, green Portrait. $285 ppd  SOLD. As you can see by the tag in the scan this card will not grade. It is what is is a filler.

[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk166/bowlingshoeguy/For%20Sale/T206CobbGreenSGC.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks

Lee

Bump for lower price.

Thanks for looking,

Lee

One last price drop.


Thanks

Lee
I don't get it, Lee...isn't that what the A grade is for...authentic...altered cards?

It appears that the bottom right hand section has been reattached.  Not sure if this is why it won't get an Auth grade, maybe PSA will holder it.

Lee

this is the exact reason they need qualifiers on all "authentic" cards  

It should be slabbed and with an "ALTERED" qualifier
